sentences.en: A preposition is usually read together with the word following it.
sentences.cn: 介词通常和它后面的词连读.

sentences.en: A preposition together with its object is called a prepositional phrase.
sentences.cn: 介词与它的宾语一起称为介词宾语.

sentences.en: Application Integrated Preposition System can solve the problem well.
sentences.cn: 综合应用前置系统的建设可以很好的解决这些问题.

sentences.en: I. We use gerund after preposition, not infinitive.
sentences.cn: 在介词后面, 我们使用动名词.

sentences.en: Notice that they is used with a variety of preposition and particle.
sentences.cn: 注意这些词总是与各类介词及小品词连用.

sentences.en: Preposition - like adverbial particles are a special class of words in English.
sentences.cn: 英语中形似介词的副词小品词是一类比较特殊的词.

sentences.en: Reflexive pronouns can be the object of a preposition.
sentences.cn: 反身代词也可作介词宾语.

sentences.en: So that each preposition can stay out the emptiness to go to fill up by reader.
sentences.cn: 各介词可以留出空白以便让读者去填入.

sentences.en: Some verbs can take either an object or preposition.
sentences.cn: 有些动词既可跟宾语,也可跟介词.

sentences.en: Some verbs do not take an object and are a preposition.
sentences.cn: 有些动词后面不跟宾语,而是与介词搭配.

sentences.en: Some verbs have an object, but are also followed a preposition.
sentences.cn: 有些动词有宾语, 但也跟介词搭配.

sentences.en: The depositor positively positioned the preposition in that position on purpose.
sentences.cn: 储户有意确信地介词放置在那个位置.

sentences.en: The word tongue in Mandarin can be used a verb a preposition.
sentences.cn: 现代汉语中,“通过”既可作动词,又可作介词,各有不同的意义和用法,又有一定联系.

sentences.en: There is nothing in the rules of grammar to suggest that ending a sentence with a preposition is wrong.
sentences.cn: 在语法规则中没有哪一条表明以介词结束一个句子是错误的。

sentences.en: You should cancel this preposition in the sentence.
sentences.cn: 你应该删去句子中的这个介词.

trans.tran_en: a word that is used before a noun,  pronoun  , or  gerund  to show place, time, direction etc. In the phrase ‘the trees in the park’, ‘in’ is a preposition.
